    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14418</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Minoranze in Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Minorities in Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Minoritäten in Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Minorités en Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Minorities em Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μειονότητες στην Ευρώπη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Minorías en Europa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli allievi possono imparare molto circa le minoranze etniche in Europa ed negli Stati Uniti.</string>
            <string language="en">Students can learn a lot about ethnic minorities in Europe and the US.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können über ethnische 
Minoritäten in Europa und in den US viel erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants peuvent se renseigner beaucoup sur 
des minorités ethniques en à l'Europe et aux USA.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes podem aprender muito sobre 
minorities étnicos em Europa e nos E. U..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να μάθουν πολύ για τις εθνικές 
μειονότητες στην Ευρώπη και τις ΗΠΑ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes pueden aprender mucho sobre 
minorías étnicas en Europa y los E.E.U.U..</string>
          </description>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo learning object- sistema di apprendimento - può essere usato per familiarizzare gli studenti con le minoranze e con i loro stili di vita e le loro lingue.</string>
